code: import _toConsumableArray from"/home/phillip/Public/react-app/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";import{produce}from'immer';import*as actionType from'../action.types';var initialState=[];export var web=function web(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actionType.UPDATE_WEB_ELEMENT:return state.map(function(el){return el.state.props.id===action.payload.id?produce(el,function(updated){updated.state.props.children[0].props.children=action.payload.text;}):el;});case actionType.UPDATE_STYLING:return state.map(function(el){return el.state.props.id===action.payload.id?produce(el,function(updated){updated.state.props.children[0].props.style[action.payload.styleProp]="".concat(action.payload.styleValue).concat(action.payload.unit);}):el;});case actionType.DELETE_WEB_ELEMENT:return state.filter(function(el){return el.state.props.id!==action.payload;});case actionType.CREATE_WEB_ELEMENT:return[].concat(_toConsumableArray(state),[{state:action.payload}]);default:return state;}};export default web;
